title: Love For All Seasons
description:
True love always deserves a happy ending, whatever the season. A charity anthology with all proceeds split between The Matthew Shepard Foundation and The Albert Kennedy Trust.
With characters who find love in a New York park, or on a college campus, in the middle of a snow storm or in the heat of summer, ‘Love for all Seasons’ delivers romance for everyone.Including stories from five established authors and supporting the work of three authors, new to the world of writing MM romance.RJ Scott - The Last ChanceV.L. Locey - Brioche for TwoAnnabelle Jacobs - Beach BoysChris McHart - Favorite FlowersDJ Jamison - Special NightsCathy Brockman - Winters ChillEJ Smyth - Who do you love, My ValentineC.M. Valencourt - Sweeter than Honey
Word 65,604
author: R.J. Scott
